creditline: Gift of Charles and Robyn Citrin
description: image is vertical column of 19 violet colored cherries with 2 cherries at L; on gray background with dark gray horizontal stripe in lower half; on cream color paper with deckle edges
markings: BL, below image, graphite: 15/35 XVII; BC, graphite: old BAT; verso BLC, graphite: Ham 96.026; verso BRC, graphite: 15993-149 / 537-55
title: Twenty-Two Cherries (XVII. someones married their everyones)
